summary: The perfect home for the average hunter! Order now for just Â£0.00 and we will deliver it for FREE! You then will find your BRAND NEW home right by the waterfall near Riverwood!
descriptionHtml:
So. I made a player home.
This little mod adds a cosy little camp site outside of Riverwood near the waterfall! It has all of your basic needs!
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the camp you will find:
A tanning rack
Some Seel Arrows
A tent & bedroll
3 minor potions
An Iron Waraxe
A Steel Dagger
Hide Boots
A storage chest (Keeps your items safe :D)
A warm fire
A strongbox 
Some Lockpicks
A book (For the bookworms :P)
Some gold
A chair
A meal
Some food to cook
A cooking spit (For the chefs)
And a wood chopping block!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
How to find your camp:
Leave Riverwood in the direction that takes you to Whiterun, Keep following the river until you hit the second waterfall. Then you will see a barrel/platform bridge, cross that and you are good to go!

For the lazy guys/girls out there:
Just go to your map and fast travel, you lazy!
author: XenoChaos
